title: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeFloorWaste
description: Pipe fitting, set into the floor, that collects waste water and discharges it to a separate trap.

NominalBodyLength.title: NominalBodyLength
NominalBodyLength.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the waste.

NominalBodyWidth.title: NominalBodyWidth
NominalBodyWidth.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the waste.

NominalBodyDepth.title: NominalBodyDepth
NominalBodyDepth.description: Nominal or quoted length measured along the z-axis in the local coordinate system of the waste.

OutletConnectionSize.title: OutletConnectionSize
OutletConnectionSize.description: Size of the outlet connection from the object.

CoverLength.title: CoverLength
CoverLength.description: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the waste.

CoverWidth.title: CoverWidth
CoverWidth.description: The length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the  waste.
